instruction: Create a layout using radialGradient, animatePath, line in a pdf-frame canvas template with animations where applicable.
output:
<pdf-frame type='canvas' width='595' height='841'>
  <i-radialGradient id='grad2' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%' stops='[{"offset":"0%","stop-color":"white"}, {"offset":"100%","stop-color":"black"}]'/>
  <i-path d='M20,20 C40,20 65,20 85,20' fill='none' stroke='black'>
  <i-animatePath
    :from="{ d: 'M20,20 C40,20 65,20 85,20' }"
    :to="{ d: 'M40,40 C60,60 85,60 105,40' }"
    ease="easeInOutSin"
    :loop="5"
    :delay="200"
    :duration="6000"
  />
</i-path>
  <i-line x1='31' y1='40' x2='75' y2='115' stroke='black'/>
</pdf-frame>

instruction: Create a layout using circle, path, image, animate, linearGradient in a <pdf-frame> canvas template with animations where applicable.
output:
<pdf-frame type='canvas' width='595' height='841'>
  <i-circle cx='80' cy='80' r='30' fill='blue'>
  <i-animate
    :to="{ cx: 200, cy: 200, r: 50, style:{ fillStyle: 'red' } }"
    ease="easeOutCubic"
    :delay="500"
    loop="5"
    direction="alternate"
    :duration="800"
  />
</i-circle>
  <i-path d='M 10 10 H 90 V 90 H 10 Z' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
  <i-image x='100' y='100' width='80' height='80' src='https://example.com/img.jpg'>
  <i-animate
    :to="{ x: 200, y: 200, width: 120, height: 120 }"
    ease="easeInOutCubic"
    :delay="700"
    loop="4"
    direction="alternate"
    :duration="1500"
  />
</i-image>
  <i-rect x='10' y='10' width='100' height='50' fill='green'>
  <i-animate
    :to="{ 
      x: 300,
      y: 200,
      height: 80,
      style:{ fillStyle: 'hsl(' + ((Math.random() * 25 * 4) % 360) + ',100%,50%)' }
    }"
    ease="easeInOutSin"
    :delay="1000"
    loop="100"
    direction="alternate"
    :duration="1000"
  />
</i-rect>
  <i-linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%' stops='[{"offset":"0%","stop-color":"red"}, {"offset":"100%","stop-color":"blue"}]'/>
</pdf-frame>

instruction: Create a layout using polyline, animatePath, path in a pdf-frame canvas template with animations where applicable.
output:
<pdf-frame type='canvas' width='595' height='841'>
  <i-polyline points='0,0 50,25 50,75 100,100' stroke='blue' fill='none'/>
  <i-path d='M20,20 C40,20 65,20 85,20' fill='none' stroke='black'>
  <i-animatePath
    :from="{ d: 'M20,20 C40,20 65,20 85,20' }"
    :to="{ d: 'M40,40 C60,60 85,60 105,40' }"
    ease="easeInOutSin"
    :loop="5"
    :delay="200"
    :duration="6000"
  />
</i-path>
  <i-path d='M 10 10 H 90 V 90 H 10 Z' fill='lightgray' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/>
</pdf-frame>

instruction: Create a layout using line, image in a pdf frame canvas template with animations where applicable.
output:
<pdf-frame type='canvas' width='595' height='841'>
  <i-line x1='44' y1='27' x2='80' y2='114' stroke='black'/>
  <i-image x='100' y='100' width='80' height='80' src='https://example.com/img.jpg'>
  <i-animate
    :to="{ x: 200, y: 200, width: 120, height: 120 }"
    ease="easeInOutCubic"
    :delay="700"
    loop="4"
    direction="alternate"

instruction: Create a layout using animate, ellipse, animatePath, text in a pdf frame canvas template with animations where applicable.
output:
<pdf-frame type='canvas' width='595' height='841'>
  <i-rect x='10' y='10' width='100' height='50' fill='green'>
  <i-animate
    :to="{ 
      x: 300,
      y: 200,
      height: 80,
      style:{ fillStyle: 'hsl(' + ((Math.random() * 25 * 4) % 360) + ',100%,50%)' }
    }"
    ease="easeInOutSin"
    :delay="1000"
    loop="100"
    direction="alternate"
    :duration="1000"
  />
</i-rect>
  <i-ellipse cx='150' cy='100' rx='40' ry='20' fill='purple'>
  <i-animate
    :to="{ cx: 300, cy: 150, rx: 60, ry: 40 }"
    ease="easeInOutQuad"
    :delay="200"
    loop="8"
    direction="alternate"
    :duration="1000"
  />
</i-ellipse>
  <i-path d='M20,20 C40,20 65,20 85,20' fill='none' stroke='black'>
  <i-animatePath
    :from="{ d: 'M20,20 C40,20 65,20 85,20' }"
    :to="{ d: 'M40,40 C60,60 85,60 105,40' }"
    ease="easeInOutSin"
    :loop="5"
    :delay="200"
    :duration="6000"
  />
</i-path>
  <i-text x='50' y='50' text='Animating Text' font-size='14'>
  <i-animate
    :to="{ x: 300, y: 70, style: { fillStyle: 'blue' } }"
    ease="easeInQuad"
    :delay="300"
    loop="6"
    direction="alternate"
    :duration="1200"
  />
</i-text>
</pdf-frame>
